title: Am I The Jerk If I Ban a Champ a Guy is Bad With?
body:
Lets say some guy shows that he wants to play Lee Sin for example and after 40 games he has a sub-30% winrate and a bad kdr. I ban it because i don't want to have a 30% chance of winning.

Am i the jerk for banning it or is he the jerk for continually picking a champ hes bad with in ranked instead of mastering it in normals first?

I feel like im in the position all the time, its pretty much the only thing i like about this new system. They usually whine a little during picks, but then do much better with the choice i forced them to pick.
